title: 미래의 삶과 기술
description: 미래의 생활과 기술 발전에 대한 글을 읽고 이해합니다.

passage.text:
What will life be like in 2050? Technology is changing our world rapidly, and the future is going to be very different from today.

In the near future, we are going to see many changes in transportation. Self-driving cars are becoming more common, and experts predict that most people will be using them within the next 20 years. These cars will be safer and more efficient than traditional vehicles. They will reduce traffic accidents and help decrease pollution in cities.

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is also going to play a bigger role in our daily lives. AI assistants are already helping us with simple tasks, but soon they will be doing much more. They will manage our schedules, control our home appliances, and even help doctors diagnose diseases. Many people are excited about these developments, but some are worried about job security.

In education, virtual reality (VR) is going to transform how students learn. Instead of reading about ancient Rome in a textbook, students will be able to walk through Roman streets and experience history firsthand. This immersive learning will make education more engaging and effective.

Climate change is a serious challenge that we are facing now, and it will continue to affect our future. Scientists are working on new technologies to combat this problem. We are going to need more renewable energy sources like solar and wind power. Many countries are planning to reduce their carbon emissions significantly by 2050.

The way we work is also changing. More people are working from home now, and this trend is going to continue. Companies are realizing that remote work can be just as productive, and it gives employees more flexibility. In the future, traditional offices might become less common.

What about food? Scientists are developing new ways to produce food sustainably. Lab-grown meat is becoming a reality, and vertical farms in cities will help us grow fresh vegetables locally. These innovations will help feed the growing global population.

The future is full of possibilities, but it also brings challenges. We need to prepare for these changes and make sure that technology serves humanity in positive ways.
